trans-unit.source: A helper class for the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> class that verifies that the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AudienceUriMode" /> property is set to a valid value.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe auxiliar para a classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> que verifica se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AudienceUriMode" /> é definida como um valor válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode" /> is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o valor do <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode" /> especificado é válido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the <paramref name="validationMode" /> is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode.Always" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode.BearerKeyOnly" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode.Never" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Quando o <paramref name="validationMode" /> é <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode.Always" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode.BearerKeyOnly" /> ou <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode.Never" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
